issue.title: [CF 214] I got the same problem. I updated TMW today and...
issue.body:
I got the same problem. I updated TMW today and it won't work now. No groups are displayed '/tmw' does nothing. When I open the options menu (Interface->AddOns->TellMeWhen) i get this error:

Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Types\buff.lua:87: attempt to perform arithmetic on upvalue 'UPD_INTV' (a nil value)
Time: 05/29/11 22:57:30
Count: 1
Stack: (tail call): ?

Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Types\buff.lua:227: in function `Setup'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2603: in function `Icon_Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1897: in function `Group_Update'
...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:670: in function <...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:667>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?

(tail call): ?
...nfig-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0.lua:798: in function <...nfig-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0\AceConfigDialog-3.0.lua:613>
(tail call): ?

Locals: <none>


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #214 | Raw
